actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the present rates of withholding of income tax until the end of the year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the current withholding tables as set forth in the Revenue Adjustment Act of 1975 shall remain in effect through December 31, 1976, rather than August 31, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the present rates of withholding of income tax until the end of the year.
